member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.CompilationPass2Task
member.summary: An MS Build task that verifies that all the types referenced in the original input XAML files are resolved.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.CompilationPass2Task.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.CompilationPass2Task.ApplicationMarkup
member.summary: A list of XAML files to process, populated by MS Build.
member.returns: A list of the XAML files to process.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.CompilationPass2Task.AssemblyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the assembly to be generated.
member.returns: The name of the assembly.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.CompilationPass2Task.BuildTaskPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the assembly for this build task.
member.returns: The assembly path.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.CompilationPass2Task.Execute
member.summary: Called by MS Build to execute the task.
member.returns: true if the task executes successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.CompilationPass2Task.LocalAssemblyReference
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the generated temporary assembly.
member.returns: The path to the generated temporary assembly.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.CompilationPass2Task.References
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of assemblies to reference during the compilation process.
member.returns: A list of the assemblies to reference during the compilation process.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.CompilationPass2Task.RootNamespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the root namespace for the project.
member.returns: The root namespace.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.GenerateTemporaryAssemblyTask
member.summary: An MS Build task that generates a temporary assembly by compiling the source files generated by the .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.GenerateTemporaryAssemblyTask.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.GenerateTemporaryAssemblyTask.ApplicationMarkupTypeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the build action for the application markup files which are excluded from the project used to generate the temporary assembly.
member.returns: The application markup type name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.GenerateTemporaryAssemblyTask.AssemblyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the generated assembly’s name.
member.returns: The assembly name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.GenerateTemporaryAssemblyTask.CompileTargetName
member.summary: Gets or sets the compilation target name to build in the generated project file used to build the generated temporary assembly.
member.returns: The compilation target name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.GenerateTemporaryAssemblyTask.CurrentProject
member.summary: Gets or sets the current project file name.
member.returns: The current project.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.GenerateTemporaryAssemblyTask.Execute
member.summary: Called by MS Build to execute the task.
member.returns: true if the code is generated successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.GenerateTemporaryAssemblyTask.OutputPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory to place the generated files in.
member.returns: The directory that stores the generated files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.GenerateTemporaryAssemblyTask.ReferencePaths
member.summary: Gets or sets the paths to any referenced assemblies specified in the project.
member.returns: A list of that represents the paths to referenced assemblies.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.GenerateTemporaryAssemblyTask.SourceCodeFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of source code files to compile into a temporary assembly.
member.returns: A list of that represents the source code files.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask
member.summary: This task accesses XAML files that define types (with x:Class) and generates the corresponding source code that can be compiled into an assembly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask.ApplicationMarkup
member.summary: A list of XAML files to process, populated by MS Build.
member.returns: A list of that represents the XAML files to process.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask.AssemblyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the assembly being compiled.
member.returns: The name of the assembly being compiled.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask.BuildTaskPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path of the assembly that contains this build task.
member.returns: The build task path.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask.Execute
member.summary: Called by MS Build to execute the code generation task.
member.returns: true if the code is generated successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask.GeneratedCodeFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of generated code files, one for each input file.
member.returns: A list of that represents the source XAML files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask.GeneratedResources
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of XAML files that contain the markup for instantiating the newly generated types, one for each input file.
member.returns: A list of that represents the generated XAML files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask.GeneratedSourceExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the file extension to add to the generated source files.
member.returns: The file extension.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask.IsInProcessXamlMarkupCompile
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the compilation of XAML markup is in process.
member.returns: True if the compilation of XAML markup is in process; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask.KnownReferencePaths
member.summary: Gets or sets the known reference paths.
member.returns: The known reference paths.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask.Language
member.summary: Gets or sets the language to generate source code in.
member.returns: The language to generate source code in.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask.OutputPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory to place the generated files.
member.returns: The directory that stores the generated files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask.References
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of assemblies to reference.
member.returns: A list of that represents referenced assemblies.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.PartialClassGenerationTask.RequiresCompilationPass2
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this project requires executing the task.
member.returns: true if there are unresolved types; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the root namespace for the project.
